content:
Hey guys,

for everyone who is familiar with Identity Server, i try to login with a SmartHealthIT example server but when i try to get the ExternalLoginInformation the function returns null.

image.png

Is there a separate Parameter i have to send to the ExternalProvider to get this information, or what is happening inside the "GetExternalLoginInfoAsync()" function to get the data?

I hope anyone has done this before and can help out.

Greetings
Lars
